metadata.description: Insyd-AI plugin marketplace for Claude Code engineering extensions

plugins.name: insyd-engineering
plugins.description: Engineering plugin for modern JavaScript/TypeScript development workflows. Includes specialized agents, commands, skills, and MCP servers for spec writing (PRD+TDD), functional testing, code review, refactoring, and codebase understanding. Optimized for Convex, Next.js, Astro, React, and Vite projects.

plugins.name: claude-mem
plugins.description: Memory and context persistence plugin. Captures Claude sessions, compresses with AI, and injects relevant context into future sessions.

plugins.name: plannotator
plugins.description: Interactive plan review tool for AI coding agents. Visual annotation with markup tools, plan management, approval workflows, and team collaboration. Auto-saves to Obsidian and Bear Notes.
